Description: Just a few blocks to the heart of Kendall Square! Don't miss this just renovated 3 bedroom rental. Featuring newer kitchen with stainless steel appliances, new central heat and A/C system, new bathroom, new energy efficient windows, small study, great light, common laundry and some basement storage. This apartment is near restaurants, shops, grocery store, 93, Lechemere and Kendall Square! Available for 9/1
